message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product. I would like to propose a price of $100 for the product.
I understand you're interested in the product, but I have to make a living. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get at least $130 for it.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget, I am willing to offer $125 for the product.
I'm glad we're getting closer to a deal, but I'm still a bit short of my target. I'm willing to meet you at $135, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that.
